meanings.definition: Delegate or entrust (a task or responsibility) to another.
meanings.sent1: She ablegates the project to her colleague.
meanings.sent2: He always ablegates difficult decisions to his manager.
meanings.sent3: The lazy student ablegates all his homework to his classmates.
meanings.sent4: The CEO ablegates the day-to-day operations to his trusted team.
meanings.sent5: The captain ablegates the navigation of the ship to the experienced sailor.

meanings.definition: A person sent or authorized to represent others, especially at a conference or meeting.
meanings.sent1: The ablegates from different countries gathered for the summit.
meanings.sent2: She was chosen as the ablegates for the important negotiation.
meanings.sent3: The ablegates were welcomed with a grand ceremony.
meanings.sent4: The ablegates presented their countries' perspectives at the conference.
meanings.sent5: The ablegates exchanged ideas and formed alliances during the meeting.
